app_name: Hello Pal Talk to the World
release_note: This update comes with a new and improved account verification process! Verify your identity by adding your mobile number and or ID to improve your Trust Score Verify your identity by adding your mobile number and or ID to improve your Trust Score Improve your Trust Score to unlock full app features like longer calls additional avatars unlimited chats and more Use the Trust Score as a guide when searching for new Pals We did a bit of hunting and magically zapped some of these bugs in this new version! Avatar was not scaled correctly when calling someone with a different OS App permission for Photos was undone after updating app Some app texts were not displayed correctly when app language is Arabic App interface display errors in iPhone 6 Translation errors for some interface texts We also made some improvements to: Searching Pals and searching within chats Remove Chat and Remove and Ignore functions were improved and renamed to Archive Chat and Ignore Chat Trash settings improved and added option to filter out messages from users with Low Trust Scores Automatic sign in when switching from Hello Pal to Travel Pal and vice versa in same device App stability In case you ve ever experienced any of the above issues please update your app! Happy chatting!
